# ðŸ¦  COVID LIVE

## What is this?

A front end project for [covidlive.it](https://covidlive.it)

## How to contribute?

All contributions are welcome, including issues, new ideas as well as updates and tweaks and more.

## Setup

Create an `.env.development` file.

```
  GATSBY_API_URL=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pcm-dpc/COVID-19/master/dati-json
  GATSBY_API_WORLD_DATA_URL=https://sharad-gql-covid19.herokuapp.com
```
